block_comment: This block of Verilog code conducts a data integrity check. When the 'check_for_truth' condition is satisfied, it assigns the value of 'o_wb_dat' to the 'a2p' variable. It then checks if 'o_wb_dat' holds the expected value 'truth_data_test'. If the condition is not met, it generates an error message detailing the expected and actual values, the time of occurrence, and terminates execution of the program if the 'ERRORSTOP' flag is enabled.
